intro: Stereosanthus delavayi, commonly known as the Yunnan jasmine, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the Oleaceae family and is characterized by its fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and have a smooth texture. The flowers bloom in clusters and are often used in traditional medicine and as ornamental plants.
